Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2013 08:18AM Villagegirl1234 wrote: I am so sorry you are going through this. I was diagnosed Nov 29 2012 and had surgery the day after Christmas. During the long wait to get the results the few people I told would tell me they just had a feeling that it will be ok. That was not helpful. Your friends just do not know what to say. I will keep you in my prayers. Try to stay strong. Dx 11/29/12 1.5 cm ICD stage 1 grade 1 0/3 nodes er+/Pr+, her2- Surgery 12/26 Lumpectomy (right) Sentinal Lymph Node Dissection (right) Onkotype score 18
Posts.Title: Need some company while I wait Azwordmom redroks2
